LanguageData.VV_LavenderPlant.description: A fragrant herb with purple flower spikes, valued for its calming aroma and use in herbal remedies.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Lavender shows a marked preference for rocky soils, flourishing in them.
LanguageData.VV_ThymePlant.description: A fragrant herb with small purple flowers and tiny green leaves. Thyme has been traditionally used for respiratory and digestive issues, and makes a flavorful tea.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Thyme shows a marked preference for rocky soils, flourishing in them.
LanguageData.VV_GinkgoTree.description: A unique deciduous tree with fan-shaped leaves and a long lifespan, known for its medicinal properties and resilience. Ginkgo leaves are commonly used in herbal teas to improve memory and circulation.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Ginkgo trees are very resistant to damage. They take less damage from prolonged lack of light, and will regenerate damage caused by any other means.
LanguageData.VV_LemonBalmPlant.description: A fragrant medicinal herb from the mint family, lemon balm is prized for its soothing, mood-lifting effects and is often used in advanced herbal medicine.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Lemon balm plants are very resistant to damage. They take less damage from prolonged lack of light, and will regenerate damage caused by any other means.
LanguageData.VV_GinsengPlant.description: A hardy medicinal plant cultivated for its thick, forked root, ginseng is renowned for boosting vitality and resilience and is a prized ingredient in traditional decoctions.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Ginseng plants need to be grown in shade: outside, but under roof. They won't grow inside.
LanguageData.VV_MarshmallowPlant.description: A soft-stemmed medicinal herb with pale flowers and fleshy roots. Traditionally used in herbal remedies for wound healing.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Marshmallow plants grow 25% slower when not grown within 6 tiles of water.
